metadata.title: USN-4197-1 -- Bind vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled certain TCP-pipelined queries. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4197-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libdns-export1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libdns1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisc169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libbind-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisc-export169-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccc-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisc-export169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 bind9 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libirs-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccc160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccfg-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccfg160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 bind9-doc - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libbind-export-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccc-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libirs-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 liblwres160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 bind9-host - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libisccfg-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 dnsutils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 bind9utils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libbind9-160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libirs160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 libdns-export1100-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11 No subscription required
